articles.title: Is AI making us dumb? - TechCrunch
articles.description: Researchers from Microsoft and Carnegie Mellon University recently published a study looking at how using generative AI at work affects critical thinking
articles.content:
Researchers from Microsoft and Carnegie Mellon University recently published a study looking at how using generative AI at work affects critical thinking skills.
